name: Red Ball Bouncing Dash!
description:
WARNING: This game is not easy

Red Ball Bouncing Dash is a simple 1 touch endless runner game that will keep you on the edge of your seat for hours. It will be quite possibly the most challenging game you've ever played but we guarantee you'll love every second.

> Simple 1 touch game play
> Incredibly easy to pick up
> Endless levels across 3 worlds
> Game center leader board

Suggestions? Feel free to shoot us an email at support@icustomized.net. We decided not to nag you with "rate me" popups so please do us a solid and write a review for Red Ball Bouncing Dash.
